## guaranteeAuthoringContentAction variable

Loads the content item if it does not exist. If the item does not exist, this triggers a [loadAuthoringContentAction](./redux-feature-auth-content.loadauthoringcontentaction.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
guaranteeAuthoringContentAction: UnaryFunction<string, GuaranteeAuthoringContentAction>
```
